name: Daisy Hardcastle Wonderful Handmade Marquee Letter Lights,
description:
Wonderful Handmade Marquee Letter Lights, made to order four weeks wasting list, made in the uk 
Sold individually or in multiples to make a word. Made from hardboard finished in enamel paint, each Letter comes with its own 12volt 2A power adaptor (CE Rated) that easily plugs into a socket either on the side or back of the Letter, you can choose.

Included in the price is one letter, 12volt power adaptor and a dimmer switch which allows your to control the brightness of the lights from a warm golden glow to a bright broadway light.

Dimensions are Height 20cm, width 2.5cm

options.name: letter please email letter and colour

name: Daisy Hardcastle Rose Buds Gorgeous
description:
Rose Buds Our Rose Buds are shaped from the supple skeleton of the rubber leaf.  The treated leaves are coloured with rich natural dyes, then folded by hand into a perfect pre-blossom cocoon.  As the light passes through the rose's fine netted petals it lends a charming, soft, innocent glow.   Perfect for baby showers, birthdays or just to brighten up the home.
Grow the glow in your home with our charming Rose Buds. The suppleness of the rubber leaf allows us to form it into a perfect pre-blossom cocoon. These darling fairy lights will bring a soft smile to any setting whether it be baby shower, bedroom or the celebration of a weddingLED string life expectancy up to 10 yrs (100,000 hrs)
Bulb hue modified to match soft light of traditional bulbs
Extremely energy efficient
Eco friendly
No heat
Safe and reliable
NO bulbs to change
 
String Details
Overall length of the light string is 5 meters or 16’ 4”
Distance from first bulb to the last bulb is 3 meters or 9’ 8"
Distance from plug to first bulb is 2 meters or 6’ 6”
String of 20 warm white LED lamps with 15 cm space between lights
Also see our 10 bulb LED strings with 33 cm space between bulbs
Flower measures approx. 6-7cm in length
Colour of the cable is clear
Fitted with a fused 3 pin British plug
LED string itself can be used both indoors and outdoors
Plug must always be connected indoors
Note: Flower decoration itself is not designed for outdoor use

Product Specifications
CE approved and meets the European Safety Standards EN60598-2-20
Complies with the European Low Voltage Directive 2006/95/EC

description: "balls" are formed by hand from a lightweight starched cotton mesh.  The balls are sheer, so as light passes through, it diffuses into a lovely, soft ambient glow.  A simple way to transform the space and best of all – no bulbs to change!

name: Daisy Hardcastle Chelsea Rose
description:
The delicate form of our Chelsea Roses give the impression of a freshly picked bouquet. The pristine elegance of the translucent paper petals emulate the delicate lip and feel of a long-stemmed rose. Diffusing a lovely soft light, the petals can be opened from bud to bloom to add effortless charm to any space.Our Chelsea Roses are made from hand-screened mulberry paper.  The outside of each petal is fused with a fine leaf skeleton, creating the impression of a fresh long-stemmed  rose.  As each petal is supported by a fine floral wire, they can be opened or closed to change the look and diffusion of the light.LED string life expectancy up to 10 yrs (100,000 hrs)

Lights come in lots of different colours and designs, a perfect  paint-free makeover brighten any space.  Off or on, day or night, our lights will add a fabulous new dimension to any setting.
 
Though many purchase our lights for weddings, birthdays or other special occasions, they are also great to liven up pockets of the home.  Change your lights from seasons to season to give it a different feel.  Or mix and match different strings and create your own new look.

name: Daisy Hardcastle Line this trio of sophisticated French-style fluted glass lights
description:
Line this trio of sophisticated French-style fluted glass lights above a dining table, in a hallway or anywhere else you want to create a stunning feature.Glass shades with nickel coated steel fixings
Includes 1m cable and adjustable supporting cord
CE approved
Requires 3x E14 max. 40W or equivalent energy saving bulbs
H130cm x W91cm; Shades H12 x Dia11cm
This impressive big brother of our standard Paris Pendant Light has a massive 38cm dome, ideal for casting an impressive orb of light over a large dining or kitchen table.The latest addition to our range of chic Paris Pendant Lights is a smaller version, perfect for tighter spaces. It can be used singly or in groups to create ambient lighting throughout the house.

name: Daisy Hardcastle bistro-style found in French cafés
description:
Add a touch of bistro-style ambience to your kitchen or dining area with this chic pendant light inspired by those found in French cafés at the beginning of the 20th century. Perfect for hanging over a table.Painted finish
White interior
Includes 1.5m braided cable
CE approved
Requires E27 max. 60W or equivalent energy saving bulb
H16 x Dia35cm
Also available in Shutter Blue

name: Daisy Hardcastle OUT DOOR Lighting
description:
Based on the lights hung outside of barns and outbuildings in rural England, our stylish rustic lamp is perfect for lighting up dark areas, indoors or out. Ideal for inside the porch or above the front door, it also looks great inside an alcove or on a kitchen wall.Zinc plated powder coated steel
Requires E27 max. 60W or equivalent energy saving bulb
Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
Requires wiring in
Rated IP 44
CE approved
H30 x Dia12 x D21cm from wall
Replacement glass available
Also available in Clay, Coffee Bean and Shutter Blue
Corner Barn Lamp, Big Barn Lamp and Porch Barn Lamp also available please email for more detailsThe big brother of our standard Barn Lamp, with a wider shade and angled from the wall to provide a larger radius of light, ideal for illuminating bigger spacesWe have extended our popular Barn lamp collection to include a new porch lamp. Based on lights outside barns and outbuildings in rural England, it is ideal for hanging in a porch or pergola to light up an outside spaceA specially adapted version of our best-selling Barn Lamp, with a corner bracket making it perfect for fixing to the edge of an exposed outside wall.
